data.title: Mobile Application Publishing
data.description: Helping You Navigate a Path to ROI

tab.title: Overview
markdown: The potential of Chinaâ€™s vast app market is compromised by its incredibly fragmented nature. Hundreds of app platforms surge and wane in popularity, and the dominant ones each have their own set of complex terms for distribution.
Online English lesson provider creates app to drive branding and sales. Challenges include adapting app for range of Chinese devices, and publishing/advertising at budget that enables ROI.
